page.title: 11Shopping in Trillick
page.content: In all there are sixteen shops in the village although not all are visited regularly.These shops sell clothes,meat,farm-machinery,drink, sweets,toys,groceries and petrol.The opening hours are very varied.The grocery shops are visited most often because they sell papers and fresh goods such as bread and vegetables. Their busiest time is the weekend.They even open on a Sunday after Church to sell the papers. People also come to the Post Office to collect their benifits.If they are ill they go to the doctor's surgery or to one of the two chemists. Trillick has two Primary schools which serve the surrounding district.
